profile:
We Design, Construct and Maintain outdoor spaces that leave you breathless.

We are Ontario's leading landscaping and construction company, based in Toronto. We pride ourselves in providing professional, accurate and friendly service. We always assure 100% satisfaction to every customer, with quality work that lasts - for years and years of enjoyment.

We will help you with individual design ideas, materials, location recommendations & anything else needed, to get your landscaping project started.

All work is performed in an ethical and patient - yet timely - manner. And the quality is proudly guaranteed for up to 5 years.

profile:
GTA Pool Demo is a Toronto based company specializing in swimming pool removal and fill-in. We have over 10 years of experience in removing pools.  We are experts in removing all types of swimming pools including in-ground pools such as, concrete, vinyl, and fiberglass as well as above ground styles.

Swimming Pool Removal

Whether you have an above ground or in-ground swimming pool, we can remove it for you.  Our experts will discuss with you in detail how we address plumbing, drainage, permits, bi-laws, and more.  We also offer various pool removal options to fit your budget and comply with local municipal regulations.  Book a free no obligation consultation with one of our expert pool removal specialist so we can assess your situation and provide you with the best recommendation and options.

Backfill Swimming Pools

Once the swimming pool has been removed, the next challenge is backfilling the hole where your pool once were. GTA Pool Demo uses only clean non-contaminated soil that will ensure the health and safety of your family.  We will compact the soil to prevent future sinking of your yard as well as ensuring adequate and proper drainage.
